title: Incident - Slow Computer
description: A user reports their computer has become very slow and unresponsive over the last few days.

tasks.description: Use the RMM tool to check the computer's performance metrics (CPU, RAM, Disk usage).
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician finds that RAM usage is consistently at 99%.

tasks.description: Check the list of running processes to identify the application consuming the most memory.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific web browser with many open tabs is identified as the cause.

tasks.description: Advise the user to close unnecessary browser tabs and restart their computer to resolve the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's computer performance returns to normal.
